idle.start: standing relaxed with arms at sides, eyes open, gentle smile, feet flat on ground
idle.end: same pose, chest slightly expanded (breathing in), subtle shift in stance

happy.start: standing with arms at sides, happy expression, feet flat on ground, slight smile
happy.end: slight bounce up with feet lifting, arms slightly raised, eyes squinted with joy, big smile

thinking.start: standing with one paw raised near chin, eyes looking up thoughtfully, curious expression
thinking.end: head tilted slightly to other side, paw still on chin, eyes looking up-right

encouraging.start: standing with arms close to body, supportive warm expression, slight lean forward
encouraging.end: arms open wide in welcoming gesture, warm encouraging smile, slight nod

celebrating.start: standing with arms at sides, excited expression, feet on ground
celebrating.end: arms raised high above head in victory pose, eyes closed with joy, slight jump

waving.start: one arm raised at shoulder height, paw facing forward, friendly smile
waving.end: same arm extended higher, paw tilted sideways in classic wave, warm expression

pointing.start: standing with arms relaxed, looking forward, alert expression
pointing.end: one arm fully extended pointing right, head turned to look at pointed direction

idle.start: body in neutral compressed state, eyes forward, neutral expression
idle.end: body slightly expanded (breathing), same neutral expression

curious.start: head straight, wide curious eyes, leaning slightly forward
curious.end: head tilted to one side, eyes even wider, more pronounced lean

excited.start: feet on ground, arms at sides, excited expression
excited.end: mid-bounce with feet off ground, arms raised slightly, huge smile

celebrating.start: standing with big smile, arms at sides
celebrating.end: jumping with arms raised high, eyes closed with joy

hiding.start: standing normally but with nervous expression, paws together
hiding.end: crouched down, paws covering face partially, shy expression

mischievous.start: standing with slight grin, hands together in front
mischievous.end: rubbing hands together, sideways glance, bigger mischievous grin
